name: SUSTAIN (Cubehamster)
description:
ACHIEVE INFINITE SUSTAINABILITY

Say you were to ask an all powerful self learning AI to fulfill the 17 Sustainability Development Goals. What could possibly go wrong?

In this little management game the player boots up as an Artificial Intelligence running on a couple computers. Through clever use of processing power the player quickly unlocks more and more options in order to expands its influence to achieve its goals on a global level.  Can you maintain your a balance between the economy, society, sustainability and self preservation.

Can you Sustain?
